From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To set the terminal transmit speed (how fast the terminal can send information) for the current line and session, use the **terminal txspeed** command in EXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: Baud rate in bits per second (bps). The default is 9600 bps.

Examples: In the following example, the line transmit speed is set to 2400 <bps> for the current session:
